finland.description: Fraudulent emails or messages attempting to steal credentials or personal information
guidanceSteps: Do not click any links or download attachments
Do not provide any personal information
Report to National Cyber Security Centre Finland
If financial information was compromised, contact your bank immediately
Report to police if financial loss occurred

finland.description: Unauthorized access or disclosure of personal data
guidanceSteps: Document all details of the breach
Report to Data Protection Ombudsman within 72 hours
Notify affected individuals if required
Report to National Cyber Security Centre for technical assistance
Preserve evidence for investigation

finland.description: Banking fraud, unauthorized transactions, or investment scams
guidanceSteps: Contact your bank immediately to freeze accounts
Report to Financial Supervisory Authority
File police report for criminal investigation
Document all transactions and communications
Change all banking credentials

finland.description: Malware that encrypts files and demands payment
guidanceSteps: Disconnect infected systems from network immediately
Do not pay the ransom
Report to National Cyber Security Centre immediately
File police report
Engage professional incident response if needed
Restore from clean backups if available
Isolate infected systems
Run antivirus/anti-malware scans
Report to National Cyber Security Centre
Change all passwords from clean device
Monitor for unusual activity

usa.description: Fraudulent emails or messages attempting to steal credentials or personal information
guidanceSteps: Do not click any links or download attachments
Do not provide any personal information
Report to FBI IC3 at www.ic3.gov
If financial information was compromised, contact your bank immediately
Forward phishing emails to spam@uce.gov and reportphishing@apwg.org

usa.description: Unauthorized access or disclosure of personal data
guidanceSteps: Document all details of the breach
Report to FTC at IdentityTheft.gov
Notify affected individuals as required by state law
Report to CISA if critical infrastructure involved
Consider credit monitoring services
File police report if identity theft occurred

usa.description: Banking fraud, unauthorized transactions, or investment scams
guidanceSteps: Contact your bank immediately to freeze accounts
Report to FBI IC3
Report to FTC at ReportFraud.ftc.gov
Contact Secret Service if significant financial loss
Place fraud alert with credit bureaus
Document all transactions and communications
